org.aksw.rex.consistency

Interface ConsistencyChecker

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConsistencyCheckerImpl

    public interface ConsistencyChecker

      Returns a subset of consistent triples by taking schema axioms into account
      Set<com.hp.hpl.jena.graph.Triple> getConsistentTriples(Set<com.hp.hpl.jena.graph.Triple> triples, Set<org.dllearner.core.owl.Axiom> axioms)
      In order to be able to check the consistency of each triple t, the set of axioms should contain: Disjointness of classes in the schema Domain and range for the predicates of each t Class assertions for subjects and objects of t

    • Method Detail

      • getConsistentTriples

        Set<com.hp.hpl.jena.graph.Triple> getConsistentTriples(Set<com.hp.hpl.jena.graph.Triple> triples)
        Returns a subset of consistent triples by taking schema axioms into account
        Parameters:
        triples - A set of triples for which a consistent subset of triples according to the given schema axiom will be returned.
        Returns:
        A consistent subset of the given set of triples.

      • getConsistentTriples

        Set<com.hp.hpl.jena.graph.Triple> getConsistentTriples(Set<com.hp.hpl.jena.graph.Triple> triples,
                                                     Set<org.dllearner.core.owl.Axiom> axioms)
        In order to be able to check the consistency of each triple t, the set of axioms should contain:
        • Disjointness of classes in the schema
        • Domain and range for the predicates of each t
        • Class assertions for subjects and objects of t
        Parameters:
        triples - A set of triples for which a consistent subset of triples according to the given schema axiom will be returned.
        axioms - The schema axiom which are used to compute a consistent subset of the given triples.
        Returns:
        A consistent subset of the given set of triples.

      • generateAxioms

        Set<org.dllearner.core.owl.Axiom> generateAxioms(org.dllearner.kb.sparql.SparqlEndpoint endpoint)
        Generates a set of schema axioms for the given SPARQL endpoint.
        Parameters:
        endpoint - The SPARQL endpoint
        Returns:
        A set of schema axioms for the given SPARQL endpoint

      • generateAxioms

        Set<org.dllearner.core.owl.Axiom> generateAxioms(org.dllearner.kb.sparql.SparqlEndpoint endpoint,
                                               org.dllearner.core.owl.ObjectProperty... properties)
        Generates domain, range for the given properties. Additionally, it generates disjointness axioms for the domain and range classes.
        Parameters:
        endpoint - The SPARQL endpoint
        properties - The properties for which domain and range axioms are generated
        Returns:
        A set of domain, range and disjointess axioms for the given SPARQL endpoint
